title: Roasted sumac pumpkin and feta soft tacos
directions: Step 1 Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place pumpkin, sumac and 2 tablespoons of oil on a large baking tray. Toss to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Roast for 35 minutes, or until pumpkin is golden and just tender.
Step 2 Heat tortillas following packet directions. Place rocket, lemon juice and remaining oil in a bowl. Toss to combine.
Step 3 Fold each tortilla in half, then in half again to form a cone. Divide rocket mixture evenly between tortillas. Top with pumpkin. Sprinkle with pine nuts and feta. Serve.
